Module the_project
Package reservation

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
reservation.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Instantiation of Reservation object this includes details such as the room, check-in date-time, check-out date-time, number of weekday and weekend of stay, number of guest
Since:
2022-03-15
Version:
7.0
Author:
Isaac, Yan kai, Davis, Wenlu, Tomoki

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(Room room, LocalDateTime checkInDateTime, LocalDateTime checkOutDateTime, long numOfWeekday, long numOfWeekend, int numOfGuest)
      Instantiation of Reservation object this includes details such as the room, check-in date-time, check-out date-time, number of weekday and weekend of stay, number of guest
      Parameters:
      room - room this is the Room object of the reservation
      checkInDateTime - this is the check in date of the reservation. The check in date will always be before the check out date.
      checkOutDateTime - this is the check out date of the reservation. The check out date will always be after the check in date.
      numOfWeekday - this is the number of weekdays for the stay
      numOfWeekend - this is the number of weekends for the stay
      numOfGuest - this is the number of guest that would be staying in the hotel for the reservation

  • Method Details

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      getRoom() returning the Room object is public
      Returns:
      this is the room with the details. Details includes type of room, availability, feature, room number, occupancy and room rate

    • getCheckInDateTime

      public LocalDateTime getCheckInDateTime()
      method returning the Check-in date and time is public.
      Returns:
      this is the check in date. The check in date will always be before the check out date.

    • getCheckOutDateTime

      public LocalDateTime getCheckOutDateTime()
      getCheckInDateTime() returning the Check-out date and time is public
      Returns:
      this is the check out date The check in date will always be before the check out date.

    • getNumOfWeekday

      public long getNumOfWeekday()
      method returning the number of weekday is public
      Returns:
      this is the number of weekday weekdays are days falling between monday to friday

    • getNumOfWeekend

      public long getNumOfWeekend()
      method returning the number of weekend is public
      Returns:
      this is the number of weekend weekdays are days falling on saturday or sunday

    • getGuestList

      public ArrayList<Guest> getGuestList()
      method returning the arraylist of guests is public
      Returns:
      this is the arraylist of guests

      method returning the number of guests is public
      Returns:
      this is the number of guests

      public void setGuestList(ArrayList<Guest> guestList)

      Parameters:

    • calcGrandTotal

      public double calcGrandTotal()
      calcGrandTotal() calculates and returns the finalized bill for the reservation object that called it.
